name: Arcticmind
description:
You wake up in a "shelter" somewhere in the arctic, you don't remember anything , in the distance you can see "humans"....

Can you survive and find your way back home?

Experience a journey through the arctic!

Explore abandoned places full of strange creatures!

Search for supplies and other essential items!

Fight strange creatures!

CONTROLS

WASD - Walk

F - Flashlight

Space - Jump

Ctrl - crouch
